cancel(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers ERC20 tokens to the maker and native tokens to the caller.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to transfer.
params.token: The address of the token to transfer.

returns._0: The address of the factory that created the escrow.

rescueFunds(address,uint256).details: This is a custom implementation of the 1inch BaseEscrow contract.This function is used to rescue funds from the escrow.This function does not have check and allow to rescue funds from the escrow to any msg.sender.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to rescue.
params.token: The address of the token to rescue. Zero address for native token.

withdraw(bytes32,address,address,uint256.details: Transfers ERC20 tokens to the target and native tokens to the caller.

params.secret: The secret that unlocks the escrow.
params.target: The address to transfer ERC20 tokens to.

getFactoryAddress().notice: Returns the address of the factory that created the escrow.

getHashlock().notice: Returns the hashlock of the escrow.
